name: R5-OrganizationAffiliation-R4B-OrganizationAffiliation
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 OrganizationAffiliation into FHIR R4B

element.display: Defines an affiliation/association/relationship between 2 distinct organizations, that is not a part-of relationship/sub-division relationship

target.display: Defines an affiliation/assotiation/relationship between 2 distinct oganizations, that is not a part-of relationship/sub-division relationship
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation`

element.display: Whether this organization affiliation record is in active use

target.display: Whether this organization affiliation record is in active use
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.active` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.active`

element.display: Definition of the role the participatingOrganization plays

target.display: Definition of the role the participatingOrganization plays
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.code`

element.display: Official contact details at the participatingOrganization relevant to this Affiliation
Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.contained`

element.display: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for this role

target.display: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for this role
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.endpoint` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.endpoint`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Healthcare services provided through the role

target.display: Healthcare services provided through the role
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.healthcareService` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.healthcareService`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.id`

element.display: Business identifiers that are specific to this role

target.display: Business identifiers that are specific to this role
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: The location(s) at which the role occurs

target.display: The location(s) at which the role occurs
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.location` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.location`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: The network in which the participatingOrganization provides the role's services (if defined) at the indicated locations (if defined)

target.display: Health insurance provider network in which the participatingOrganization provides the role's services (if defined) at the indicated locations (if defined)
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.network` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.network`

element.display: Organization where the role is available

target.display: Organization where the role is available
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.organization` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.organization`

element.display: Organization that provides/performs the role (e.g. providing services or is a member of)

target.display: Organization that provides/performs the role (e.g. providing services or is a member of)
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.participatingOrganization` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.participatingOrganization`

element.display: The period during which the participatingOrganization is affiliated with the primary organization

target.display: The period during which the participatingOrganization is affiliated with the primary organization
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.period` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.period`

element.display: Specific specialty of the participatingOrganization in the context of the role

target.display: Specific specialty of the participatingOrganization in the context of the role
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.specialty` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.specialty`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `OrganizationAffiliation.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.text`
